title: Dreadknight Garen
body: I have a problem with Dreadknight Garen. I have this free code but when I enter the code in the store, I get an error

replies.body: Looks like this NA account already had the skin and champion, maybe someone was able to get it added in your ticket?

If the code isn't working for you, feel free to [submit a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and request the skin. Alternatively, you can wait for a poro to get back and notice you here, and they'll add it to your account. You might want to check out Unchained Alistar and Riot Girl Tristana while you're at it (also free skins)!
